item.angelring.itemring.not_enough_xp: 你需要有經驗值才能飛行。 獲得更多經驗值以再次飛行。
item.angelring.itemring.desc0: 天使之戒在飛行時會隨著時間的推移消耗玩家的經驗值。
item.angelring.itemring.desc1: 如果玩家的經驗值低於一級，
item.angelring.itemring.desc2: magic will disappear and flight will not be possible.
item.angelring.itemring.classic.desc0: Angel Ring is switched into Classic Mode. Grants creative flight while in Curios slot.
item.angelring.itemring.classic.desc1: Switch XP draining to more than 0 points in the config to switch to Rebalanced Mode.
item.angelring.energetic_angel_ring.not_: You need more FE to fly. Charge your Angel Ring to fly again.
item.angelring.energetic_angel_ring.desc: Angel Ring drains the stored FE over time while flying.
Angel Ring currently contains %s FE / %s FE.
